name: Brownie Pudding
instructions: Mix the flour, salt, cocoa, vanilla, baking powder, sugar, milk, oil, and nuts in a large mixing bowl.
Pour into either two bread pans or a 13x9 pan.
For the sauce, mix the brown sugar, cocoa, and hot water.
Pour on top of the existing batter in the pan. DO NOT MIX.
Bake for 45 minutes at 350 deg. It may need to go longer. It should bubble around the edge of the brownie once it's done.
